attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we focus on stuff that happen today not tommorow for example terrosists but we should be focusing on the earth tomorrow we should stop wasting so much co2 by e.g rationing petrol banning cars and telling other countries to do the same becasue when we are dead our bodies will burn if we dont stop it so im begging you to sign this petion

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
